message.body: William Blair: Reports Of Apple-Related Problems At Finisar 'Profoundly Inaccurate' https://benzinga.com/z/11475968 $AAPL $FNSR $IIVI

links.title: William Blair: Reports Of Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL)-Related Problems At Finisar (NASDAQ:FNSR) 'Profoundly Inaccurate'
links.description: After falling 30 percent since its March 8 third-quarter report, Finisar Corporation (NASDAQ: FNSR) represents an opportunity for investors, according to William Blair. William Blair's Dmitry Netis maintains an Outperform rating on Finisar's stock with no assigned price target. Finisar's stock has underperformed the broader market "significantly" amid multiple concerning headlines in recent months, Netis said in a Thursday note.
